title: Niti Aayog has an answer to crack school education’s big test: measuring learning outcomes
text:
The conversation on school education has moved from enrolment to learning outcomes. The cost of a dismal show in learning progress is invisible but high, which highlights the need for a system to measure it. The latest attempt at this is Niti Aayog’s School Education Quality Index. What gaps in the current system does it aim to plug?
